actions.text: On agreeing to the Sestak amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment amends the articulation agreement strategies that may be employed by states and institutions of higher education to include management systems regarding course equivalency, transfer of credit, and articulation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-523 to amend the articulation agreement strategies that may be employed by states and institutions of higher education to include management systems regarding course equivalency, transfer of credit, and articulation.
